name: .PLF File Extension
summary: Learn about .PLF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: License file used by Papyrus Live Updater, a program that registers Papyrus software products; contains license information that can be imported into the Papyrus suite of applications to register an application, module, or plug-in.

content: You can double-click a PLF file to install a software license. Once the file is double-clicked, Papyrus Live Updater will open and allow you to import the license information.
NOTE: Papyrus Live Updater has been discontinued.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
